page.title: 16 JENWAYS
page.content: Jenway Ltd provides a good deal of local employment. The company is sited at Gransmore Green,Felstead. They are manufactuers of electronic digital readout measuring instruments. This small industry is owned by Richard May who is the managing director,and Sid bashford,who is the technical director. The approx size of the site is 3 acres and is owned freehold. The company employs 65 people.They export 70% of their goods and this goes world-wide. The average age of the employees is 22. The employees work from 08:30 until 17:00. They are mainly from Rayne,Braintree and Felstead. Jenways has two sister companies on the same site. They are Kalstead Ltd and Pathart Ltd. The building which houses Jenway Ltd used to be an egg-packing station. There are plans for future development.
